00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Openvpn extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'openvpn';
00041     public $User= '\S+';
00042     
00043     public $NVPS= '\h';
00044     
00045     private $confDir= '/etc/openvpn/';
00046     public $LogFile= '/var/log/openvpn.log';
00047     
00048     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/sbin/openvpn --version 2>&1';
00049     
00050     function Openvpn()
00051     {
00052         parent::Model();
00053         
00054         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00055             $this->Commands,
00056             array(
00057                 'Restart'   => array(
00058                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00059                     'desc'  => _('Start OpenVPN process'),
00060                     ),
00061 
00062                 'StopProcess'=> array(
00063                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00064                     'desc'  => _('Stop OpenVPN instance'),
00065                     ),
00066 
00067                 'IsClientConf'=> array(
00068                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00069                     'desc'  => _('If client conf'),
00070                     ),
00071                 
00072                 'CopyConf'  => array(
00073                     'argv'  => array(NAME, NAME),
00074                     'desc'  => _('Copy conf'),
00075                     ),
00076                 
00077                 'GetConfs'  => array(
00078                     'argv'  => array(),
00079                     'desc'  => _('Get confs'),
00080                     ),
00081                 
00082                 'DeleteConf'=> array(
00083                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00084                     'desc'  => _('Delete conf'),
00085                     ),
00086                 )
00087             );
00088     }
00089 
00091     function GetConfFile($conf, $group)
00092     {
00093         return '/etc/openvpn/'.$conf;
00094     }
00095 
00096     function SetConfig($confname)
00097     {
00098         global $ClientConfig, $ServerConfig;
00099         
00100         if ($this->IsClientConf($confname)) {
00101             $this->Config= $ClientConfig;
00102         }
00103         else {
00104             $this->Config= $ServerConfig;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     
00112     function StopProcess($conffile)
00113     {
00114         $pid= $this->FindPid($conffile);
00115         if ($pid > -1) {
00116             return $this->KillPid($pid);
00117         }
00118         return TRUE;
00119     }
00120 
00127     function Restart($conffile)
00128     {
00129         global $TmpFile;
00130 
00131         if ($this->StopProcess($conffile)) {
00132             $count= 0;
00133             while ($count++ < self::PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT) {
00134                 if ($this->FindPid($conffile) > -1) {
00135                     return TRUE;
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 $cmd= "/usr/local/sbin/openvpn --config /etc/openvpn/$conffile --daemon --status /var/log/openvpn-status.log 5 > $TmpFile";
00139                 $this->RunShellCommand($cmd);
00140                 exec('/bin/sleep .1');
00141             }
00142 
00144             $output= file_get_contents($TmpFile);
00145             ViewError($output);
00146             cwc_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Restart failed with: $output");
00147             
00148             // Check one last time due to the last sleep in the loop
00149             return $this->FindPid($conffile) > -1;
00150         }
00151         return FALSE;
00152     }
00153 
00160     function IsClientConf($file)
00161     {
00162         if (($this->GetName($this->confDir.$file, 'client') !== FALSE) ||
00163             ($this->GetName($this->confDir.$file, 'tls-client') !== FALSE)) {
00164             return TRUE;
00165         }
00166         return FALSE;
00167     }
00168 
00173     function FindPid($conffile)
00174     {
00175         $re= '/^(.*)\.conf$/';
00176         if (preg_match($re, $conffile, $match)) {
00177             $file= $match[1].'.conf';
00178 
00179             $pidcmd= "/bin/ps arwwx | /usr/bin/grep openvpn | /usr/bin/grep '$file' | /usr/bin/grep -v -e cwc.php -e grep";
00180             $output= $this->RunShellCommand($pidcmd);
00181             
00182             $re= '/^\s*(\d+)\s+/m';
00183             if (preg_match($re, $output, $match)) {
00184                 if ($match[1] !== '') {
00185                     return $match[1];
00186                 }
00187             }
00188         }
00189         return -1;
00190     }
00191 
00194     function GetConfs()
00195     {
00196         return $this->GetFiles($this->confDir.'*.conf');
00197     }
00198 
00199     function DeleteConf($Conf)
00200     {
00201         return $this->DeleteFile($this->confDir.$Conf);
00202     }
00203 
00209     function CopyConf($file, $newfile)
00210     {
00211         if (!file_exists($this->confDir.$newfile)) {
00212             // copy() returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure
00213             return copy($this->confDir.$file, $this->confDir.$newfile);
00214         }
00215         cwc_syslog(LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Dest file already exists '.$this->confDir.$newfile);
00216         return FALSE;
00217     }
00218 }
